Toss and Close.name: Toss and Close
Toss and Close.flavor: You throw your weapon at the target, rapidly close the ground between you and it, and get in a quick melee attack.
Toss and Close.requirement: You must be wielding a light thrown or heavy thrown weapon.
Toss and Close.effect: After the attack is resolved, move your speed toward the target of your ranged attack; you can draw one melee weapon during this movement. If you are within melee range at the end of this movement, make a melee basic attack against the target.

Focused Assault.name: Focused Assault
Focused Assault.flavor: You spend a moment refocusing your fury and can attack the enemy with renewed vigor.
Focused Assault.effect: The target is considered your quarry and is marked by you until the end of your next turn.

Coordinated Devastation.name: Coordinated Devastation
Coordinated Devastation.flavor: You slice into the enemy, creating a gaping wound that is easy for your allies to target with their attacks.
Coordinated Devastation.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Coordinated Devastation.attack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and off-hand weapon), two attacks
Coordinated Devastation.onHit:
2[W] + Strength modifier damage per attack. If both attacks hit, all allies score critical hits against the target on rolls of 18 or higher until the end of your next turn.
If the target is Large or larger and at least one attack hits, all allies score critical hits against the target on rolls of 17 or higher until the end of your next turn.
